nodes.text: U9-C4, also known simply as Ceefor, was a masculine R5-series astromech droid member of D-Squad during the Clone Wars. He belonged to Jedi Knight Thongla Jur.
Around 20 BBY, the squad, now led by Colonel Meebur Gascon, was given the task of infiltrating a Separatist ship and stealing a decoding module.

When the squad went to see the Parwan doctor Gubacher, he gave U9-C4 the modification that allowed him to use a powerful laser cutter, which would be used several times throughout the mission to cut open doors and later destroy several battle droids. However, the laser cutter had a large amount of recoil and U9-C4 had to lock himself in position otherwise the recoil would launch him backward.
In Dave Filoni's sketch of D-Squad, U9-C4 was depicted as an R6-series astromech droid.
